name: Sexy RSS Footer
author: Evgeni Golov

sections.description:
With Sexy RSS Footer you can add everything you want to the end of every feed entry.
Backlink to the site? Sure.
Number of comments? Sure.
Flattr link? Sure.
Something totaly different? Yepp, even that!

Suggestions for more replacement variables highly welcome!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the sexy-rss-footer directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the settings for ‘Sexy RSS Footer’
  4. Edit the template as you wish.

short_description: Sexy RSS Footer enables you to add any possible content at the end of every feed entry. This includes variables like number of comments, author etc.
